00061 namespace OpenSim { 
00062 
00063 class OSIMCOMMON_API BSpline : public Function
00064 {
00065 //=============================================================================
00066 // MEMBER VARIABLES
00067 //=============================================================================
00068 protected:
00069     int _order;                                         // order of b-spline
00070     int _nControlPoints;                                // number of control points
00071     int _nParametricKnots;                              // number of parametric knots
00072     int _nCurvePoints;                                  // number of curve points
00073     int _nDimensions;                                   // number of dimensions for control points and curve points
00074     SimTK::Matrix _controlPoints;                       // control points (matrix)
00075     SimTK::Vector _parametricKnots;                     // parametric knots (vector)
00076     SimTK::Matrix _blendingFunction;                    // blending function (matrix)
00077     SimTK::Matrix _curvePoints;                         // curve points (matrix)
00078     SimTK::Matrix _dataPoints;                          // data points (matrix)
00079 
00080 //=============================================================================
00081 // METHODS
00082 //=============================================================================
00083 public :
00084     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085     // CONSTRUCTION
00086     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------

00089     virtual ~BSpline();                                 // destructor
00090     //virtual Object* copy() const;                     // returns a copy of this object
00091 
00092     void createComponents(int, int, int);               // create the b-spline components
00093     void createParametricKnots();                       // create the parametric knot vector
00094     void createBlendingFunction();                      // create the blending function
00095     void createCurvePoints();                           // create the curve points
00096     void createControlPoints();                         // create the control points

00109     int  getOrder();                                    // returns the order of the b-spline
00110 
00111     void setNControlPoints(int);                        // set the number of control points
00112     int  getNControlPoints();                           // returns the number of control points
00113 
00114     void setControlPoint(int, int, SimTK::Real);        // set the value of a specified control point
00115     SimTK::Real getControlPoint(int, int);              // returns the specified control point value
00116 
00117     void setControlPoints(SimTK::Matrix);               // set the value of all control points
00118     SimTK::Matrix getControlPoints();                   // returns the control points
00119 
00120     // Setting the number of parametric knots is not possible
00121     int  getNParametricKnots();                         // returns the number of parametric knots
00122 
00123     // Setting the knot vector value at index i is not possible
00124     SimTK::Real getParametricKnotValue(int);            // returns the knot vector value at index i
00125 
00126     // Setting the knot vector is not possible
00127     SimTK::Vector getParametricKnots();                 // returns the knot vector
00128 
00129     void setNCurvePoints(int);                          // set the number of curve points

00131 
00132     // Setting the specified curve point value is not possible
00133     SimTK::Real getCurvePoint(int, int);                // returns the specified curve point value
00134     
00135     // Setting the curve points is not possible
00136     SimTK::Matrix getCurvePoints();                     // returns the curve points
00137 
00138     void setDataPoint(int, int, SimTK::Real);           // set the value of a specified data point
00139     SimTK::Real getDataPoint(int, int);                 // returns the specified data point value
00140     
00141     void setDataPoints(SimTK::Matrix);                  // set the value of all data points
